Title: Requires certain entities to stock opioid antagonists and to store naloxone nasal sprays with or adjacent to automated external defibrillator cabinets
Summary: Requires certain entities to stock opioid antagonists and to store naloxone nasal sprays with or adjacent to automated external defibrillator cabinets.
LawCode: Amd §922, Ed L; amd §§3309 & 3000-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to requiring certain entities to stock opioid antagonists and to store naloxone nasal sprays with or adjacent to automated external defibrillator cabinets
